br.com.neppo.cache.memcached

Class MemcachedManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.neppo.cache.memcached.MemcachedManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheManager

    public class MemcachedManager
extends Object
implements CacheManager
    Cache Manager CacheManager implementation utilizing the Memcached framework for all cache functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • getCache

        public <K,V> Cache<K,V> getCache(String name)
                    throws CacheException
        Description copied from interface: CacheManager
        Acquires the cache with the specified name. If a cache does not yet exist with that name, a new one will be created with that name and returned.
        Specified by:
        getCache in interface CacheManager
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the cache to acquire.
        Returns:
        the Cache with the given name
        Throws:
        CacheException - if there is an error acquiring the Cache instance.
